oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ADAR programme
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ADAR (Agricultural and rural development agency) is an institution which funds projects in the agriculture field. Between year 2005 and 2007, 3 projects in Organic farming have been financed. These projects are described as projects, but also gathered and described as part of program (items 6642, 6643 and 6644) in the data basis.
